message: I propose dividing the money into two equal parts. This ensures fairness in our division.
I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  While it's not a perfectly equal split, I believe it's a fair reflection of the value I bring to this negotiation. Let's see if we can agree on this.
Considering the inflation and previous offers, I suggest an equal division of the funds. This maintains fairness and reflects the diminishing value of money with each passing round.
